Text:
Hi phatwarez, i was just wondering if you will start uploading NFL games again this season?

if you do, can you please up the New england patriots for me, thanks
Probably not unless I have a reliable source.

Well I would really appreciate if you would.

TYT keeps disabling my accounts :(

Yup same, it's not worth the effort to keep an account there. Unless I find another source of consistent NFL games, I can only record what's locally shown.

We should make a thread in suprbay about this, TPB comments isn't an efficient way to discuss.
